root.name: Bomberman GB3
root.description: OverviewBomberman GB3, as the name implies, is the third game in the Bomberman GB series (the first Bomberman GB became Wario Blast and Bomberman GB2 was renamed Bomberman GB for Western territories). It features an objective-based single player mode, which is used again for Bomberman Max and Max 2, and the franchise's famous Battle Mode.
